pageTitle: Study of Acid Reflux in Asthma - Study Results - ClinicalTrials.gov
textBeforeTable: Reporting Groups No text entered. Significant events and approaches for the overall study following participant enrollment, but prior to group assignment Pre-Assignment Details The planned enrollment was for 400 participants, 403 participants actually were enrolled and randomized in the trial. It is not uncommon for clinical trials not to exactly meet the sample size stated in the protocol.
